function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate physical activity leading to poor physical and mental health","Impact":"Increased risk of physical and mental health issues such as anxiety, depression, and decreased fitness","Mitigation":"Encouraging and facilitating regular physical activity through various forms of exercise, including aerobic, balance and flexibility, and muscular strength and endurance training","Technologies":"Motion sensors, exergames (active video games)","People":"Individuals of all ages, especially those in quarantine or social isolation","Owner":"Health organizations, fitness professionals, and individuals"},{"Description":"High prevalence of anxiety and depression during quarantine","Impact":"Increased prevalence of anxiety and depression, especially among those in quarantine, leading to negative mental health outcomes","Mitigation":"Providing psychological support, promoting physical activity as a means to alleviate anxiety and depression, and addressing social and economic factors associated with higher anxiety and depression scores","Technologies":"Psychological support services, exergames (active video games), motion sensors","People":"Individuals in quarantine, those with lower income and education level","Owner":"Health organizations, mental health professionals, and local communities"}]}
